column4: is it possible that the driver for my sata controller has been taken out of the linux kernel? i can't update my kernel and i can't install the new ubuntu from the cd.
or would my problem be that i downloaded the amd64 cd? i thought that would be the correct one; i have an intel core 2 duo
the 32bit works great on my core2duo; depends on if you have a massive amount of ram or not
thanks, i guess i'll try that then, i have 2gb of ram so it should be ok
